title: tara vENum
sahitya:
tara vENum endanadu kurai tIra undanaruL tiruccendUr tanil sirandiDum kandanE


anupallavi

  oru pOdum iduvarai tirunAmam unadai nAn siridEnum karudAmal irundadariyEn adalAl


caraNam    eDutteDuttu nIrai ettanai iraittAlum kaDugaLavEnum karum kaDalin urumArAdE
aDuttaDuttE varum aDiyArkkaruLai vAri koDuttuk-keDuttE un koDaikkaram sOrAdE
